imdb.plot outline: The show that inspires millions to better themselves isn't just television, it's a cultural phenomenon. Join The Biggest Loser as it encourages overweight participants to shed pounds in a safe and recommended manner, through comprehensive diet and exercise, in an effort to help them transform their bodies, health, and ultimately, their lives.
imdb.title: The Biggest Loser: The Workout
plot: The show that inspires millions to better themselves isn't just television, it's a cultural phenomenon. Join The Biggest Loser as it encourages overweight participants to shed pounds in a safe and recommended manner, through comprehensive diet and exercise, in an effort to help them transform their bodies, health, and ultimately, their lives.
